/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Power lines crisscross above, forming a web-like pattern against the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the soft light of the day. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors are vibrant and natural, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. This is a typical day in Beijing, where history and modernity coexist harmoniously.
